mapper.insert: insert into new_board_table(boardWriter, boardWriterId, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardWriterId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into new_board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i%s") as createdAt, boardHits from new_board_table order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(id) as count from new_board_table where ${type} Like CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')
mapper.update: update new_board_table set boardHits=boardHits+1 where id = #{id}
